column1: Local Foods////Crispy chicken sandwich is a delightful mix of fresh flavors and textures. A good serving of meat
column2: the kind of sandwich you struggle to fit in your mouth. The kale side is a little bland for me
column3: but they do make the kale taste good without hiding it behind something
column4: and still have a good crunch; that's impressive enough for me. A great draft option or two. Hint of Asian fusion Viet flavors
column5: sharing a kitchen with Thai Spice: Thai basil in the sandwich
column6: soybeans and peanut in the slaw side
column7: coconut milk in the soup. I found myself scraping with my fork to get every scrap. Totally worth the money
